mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE t_board_tmp(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, id, LEVEL, v) AS ( SELECT articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, id, 1, cast(articleNO as char(100)) v FROM t_board WHERE parentNO=0 UNION ALL SELECT t2.articleNO, t2.parentNO, t2.title, t2.content, t2.writeDate, t2.id, tmp.LEVEL+1, concat(tmp.v, ",", t2.articleNO) v FROM t_board t2, t_board_tmp tmp WHERE t2.parentNO = tmp.articleNO ) SELECT articleNo, parentNO, title, content ,writedate, id, LEVEL, v FROM t_board_tmp ORDER BY v;
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) VALUES(#{articleNO},#{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
INSERT into t_board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) VALUES(#{articleNO}, #{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in( WITH RECURSIVE t_board_tmp(articleNO, parentNO, LEVEL) AS ( SELECT articleNO, parentNO, 1 FROM t_board WHERE parentNO=0 AND articleNO = #{articleNO} UNION ALL SELECT t2.articleNO, t2.parentNO, tmp.LEVEL+1 FROM t_board t2, t_board_tmp tmp WHERE t2.parentNO = tmp.articleNO ) SELECT articleNO FROM t_board_tmp )
